articles.author: Rob Hayes
articles.title: Cluster of COVID-19 cases traced to coughing woman, lack of masks at SoCal birthday party - KGO-TV
articles.description: A birthday party in Southern California where a woman without a face mask was coughing and other guests weren't observing social distancing has led to at least five COVID-19 cases and possibly more, officials say.
articles.content: PASADENA, Calif. -- If there's one thing you don't want to do in the middle of a pandemic lockdown, it's throwing a big birthday party.But that's exactly what happened in Pasadena last month. And when a woman infected with coronavirus showed up and was coughi… [+1969 chars]

articles.title: Childhood vaccinations plunge since COVID-19 pandemic started, CDC says - KSL.com
articles.description: Childhood vaccinations have plunged since the COVID-19 pandemic began spreading through the United States, the U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention said Friday.
articles.content:
NEW YORK (CNN) Childhood vaccinations have plunged since the COVID-19 pandemic began spreading through the United States, the U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention said Friday.
